text: Khushialo nende mwikulu, ne bakhureebanga okhulondokhana nende Abana abafwilwa, boola mbu â€œokhubakholela amalayi nobulayi, ne nimubasaasia halala ninanyu nga abakhali abana benyu, Ne Nyasaye yamanya muno owobutobela nende omukholi wamalayi, ne Nyasaye yenyanga yakhabenjisiye mukalabasangasia (enywe tawe) , toto Nyasaye niwa Amani Owamachesi muno
